modification.name: Adiciona a url amigável automaticamente no cadastro ou edição
modification.author: OpenCart Brasil

operation.add: $('input[name="product_description[<?php foreach ($languages as $language) { if ( $language_store == $language['code']) { echo $language['language_id']; } }; ?>][name]"]').stringToSlug({ setEvents: 'keyup keydown blur', getPut: 'input[name="keyword"]', space: '-', replace: '/\s?\([^\)]*\)/gi', AND: 'e' });

$('input[name="category_description[<?php foreach ($languages as $language) { if ($language_store == $language['code']) { echo $language['language_id']; } }; ?>][name]"]').stringToSlug({ setEvents: 'keyup keydown blur', getPut: 'input[name="keyword"]', space: '-', replace: '/\s?\([^\)]*\)/gi', AND: 'e' });

$('input[name="information_description[<?php foreach ($languages as $language) { if ($language_store == $language['code']) { echo $language['language_id']; } }; ?>][title]"]').stringToSlug({ setEvents: 'keyup keydown blur', getPut: 'input[name="keyword"]', space: '-', replace: '/\s?\([^\)]*\)/gi', AND: 'e' });
$('input[name="name"]').stringToSlug({ setEvents: 'keyup keydown blur', getPut: 'input[name="keyword"]', space: '-', replace: '/\s?\([^\)]*\)/gi', AND: 'e' });
